description: A mobile dice rolling app that allows users to roll dice and save their rolls for later use. Great for tabletop games like Dungeons and Dragons!

An alarm app that wakes the user with a unique alarm tone, locks the users phone, and requires them to solve a simple puzzle to unlock the phone and silence the alarm! Great for those who need to get up early!
An app that generates a random pizza topping for the user. Great for those who can't decide what to put on their pizza!
